result.eng: According to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ga: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.orig: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoire
result.html: Dar leis na comharsana tá siad imithe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.
result.ponchtml: Dar leis na coṁarsana tá siad imiṫe ar saoireAccording to the neighbours, they have gone on holiday.

result.eng: The next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ga: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.orig: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shin
result.html: D'fhág na comharsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó shinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág na coṁarsana béal dorais roinnt míonna ó ẛinThe next-door neighbours left a couple of months ago.

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: In áit na seanċoṁarsan ḃog teaġlaċ nua isteaċ a ḃí i gcónaí ag coṫú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.

result.eng: A prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.
result.ga: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbh
result.orig: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbh
result.html: Urnaí le comharsana a bhí ar shlua na marbhA prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.
result.ponchtml: Urnaí le coṁarsana a ḃí ar ẛlua na marḃA prayer for neighbours who are among the dead.
